member.name: T:RWXServer.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:RWXServer.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:RWXServer.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: P:RWXServer.My.Resources.Resources.network_connection_control_panel
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Ressource vom Typ System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: E:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.LicenseSuspended
member.summary: Occurs when the user's license is suspended.

member.name: E:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.LicenseAuthorized
member.summary: Occurs when the user's license is authorized by the server.

member.name: E:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.LicenseRefreshed
member.summary: Occurs when the user's license is reauthorized by the server.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.IPAddress
member.summary: Gets the user's wide area network IPv4 address.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.UserName
member.summary: Gets the user's sign-in name.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.CreationDate
member.summary: Gets the date the user's license was first created.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.ExpirationDate
member.summary: Gets the expiration date of the user's license, when is True.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.TimeRemaining
member.summary: Gets the time remaining on the user's license, when is True.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.LicenseType
member.summary: Gets the license type associated with the user's license.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.LicenseExpires
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the user's license will expire.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.MachineId
member.summary: Gets a unique identifier for the machine. This value is not static.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.GetPublicToken
member.summary: Gets a token representing the key returned by which can be decoded with the PrivateKey web API.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.GetPrivateKey
member.summary: Gets a secret key that can be used for encryption.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.GetUsersOnline
member.summary: Gets the number of users currently signed in and using the program.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.GetUpdatesAvailable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether updates are available.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.GetBlogPosts
member.summary: Gets blog posts submitted by the application developer.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.GetSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Gets settings defined by the application developer.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.InstallUpdates
member.summary: Downloads and installs updates if they are available.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.Broker.SuspendUser(System.String)
member.summary: Suspends the currently signed in user's license.

member.summary: Initializes the authenticator and shows the authentication dialog.

member.summary: Initializes the authenticator and shows the authentication dialog.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.BlogPost.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique id for the post.

member.summary: Gets the title for the post.

member.summary: Gets the number of times the post has been read by users.

member.summary: Gets the date that the post was originally posted.

member.name: M:RWXServer.NetSeal.BlogPost.GetPostBody
member.summary: Gets the body for the post.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.BrokerSettings.DialogTheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme that will be used by the authentication dialog.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.BrokerSettings.CatchUnhandledExceptions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch unhandled exceptions and report them to the server.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.BrokerSettings.DeferAutomaticUpdates
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore automatic updates.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.BrokerSettings.SilentAuthentication
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the authentication window will be shown. This option should only be used in products that provide lifetime licenses.

member.name: P:RWXServer.NetSeal.BrokerSettings.VerifyRuntimeIntegrity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to verify the integrity of core runtime files (mscorlib, System, and System.Security).
